48.eng-name: The Book Pertaining to the Remembrance of Allah, Supplication, Repentance and Seeking Forgiveness

hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated on the authority of Safwan b. 'Abdullah b. Safwan with the same chain of transmitters

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ الدُّعَاءِ لِلْمُسْلِمِينَ بِظَهْرِ الْغَيْبِ
chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of Praying For The Muslims In Their Absence
